  • class pFluid
    The fluid class represents the main module for the particle based fluid simulation. SPH (Smoothed Particle Hydrodynamics) is used to animate the particles. More...

Enumeration Type Documentation

enum pFluidFlag

Fluid flags.

Enumerator:
PFF_VISUALIZATION 

Enables debug visualization for the NxFluid.

PFF_DisableGravity 

Disables scene gravity for the NxFluid.

PFF_CollisionTwoway 

Enable/disable two way collision of fluid with the rigid body scene. In either case, fluid is influenced by colliding rigid bodies. If PFF_CollisionTwoway is not set, rigid bodies are not influenced by colliding pieces of fluid. Use pFluidDesc.collisionResponseCoefficient to control the strength of the feedback force on rigid bodies.

See also:
NxFluidDesc.collisionResponseCoefficient
PFF_Enabled 

Enable/disable execution of fluid simulation.

PFF_Hardware 

Defines whether this fluid is simulated on the PPU.

PFF_PriorityMode 

Enable/disable particle priority mode. If enabled, the oldest particles are deleted to keep a certain budget for new particles. Note that particles which have equal lifetime can get deleted at the same time. In order to avoid this, the particle lifetimes can be varied randomly.

See also:
pFluidDesc.numReserveParticles
PFF_ProjectToPlane 

Defines whether the particles of this fluid should be projected to a plane. This can be used to build 2D fluid applications, for instance. The projection plane is defined by the parameter pFluidDesc.projectionPlane.

See also:
pFluidDesc.projectionPlane
PFF_ForceStrictCookingFormat 

Forces fluid static mesh cooking format to parameters given by the fluid descriptor.

Currently not implemented!

enum pFluidSimulationMethod

Describes the particle simulation method.

Particles can be treated in two ways: either they are simulated considering interparticular forces (SPH), or they are simulated independently. In the latter case (with the simulation method set to PFS_NO_PARTICLE_INTERACTION), you still get collision between particles and static/dynamic shapes, damping, acceleration due to gravity, and the user force.

Enumerator:
PFS_SPH 

Enable simulation of inter particle forces.

PFS_NoParticleInteraction 

Do not simulate inter particle forces.

PFS_MixedMode 

Alternate between SPH and simple particles.

enum pFluidCollisionMethod

The fluid collision method.

Enumerator:
PFCM_Static 

collide with static objects

PFCM_Dynamic 

collide with dynamic objects
